import { Fragment } from 'react' import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Disclosure, Menu, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { Bars3Icon, BellIcon, XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import { navigation } from '../api/Navigation'; import AuthService from "./services/auth.service"; import Login from "./login/Login"; import Register from "./login/Register"; import Home from "./page/Home"; import Profile from "./page/Profile"; import BoardUser from "./page/BoardUser"; import BoardModerator from "./page/BoardModerator"; import BoardAdmin from "./page/BoardAdmin"; import klee from '../assests/klee_icon.png'; export default function Navbar() { const [showModeratorBoard, setShowModeratorBoard] = useState(false); const [showAdminBoard, setShowAdminBoard] = useState(false); const [currentUser, setCurrentUser] = useState(undefined); useEffect(() => { const user = AuthService.getCurrentUser(); if (user) { setCurrentUser(user); console.log(user); setShowModeratorBoard(user.role.includes("ROLE_MODERATOR")); setShowAdminBoard(user.role.includes("ROLE_ADMIN")); } }, []); const logOut = () => { AuthService.logout(); }; return (
